title: Marketing Design Intern
content:
Eulerity is a rapidly growing technology company providing marketing automation technology to small businesses and franchises. Our industry recognized proprietary software solution supports the creation, execution, and analysis of paid marketing across all major digital channels including Google Search, Social Media (Facebook / Instagram), Display, & Video. We are currently seeking a skilled, creative, organized intern to support our growing marketing team and its efforts! 
Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project objectives and design requirements.
Create compelling and engaging visual content for various marketing materials, including social media posts, website graphics, email campaigns, digital ads, and print materials.
Assist in the development of branded marketing collateral, ensuring consistency in design and messaging across different platforms.
Support the creation of eye-catching visuals for presentations, infographics, marketing videos and other communication materials.
Contribute innovative ideas to enhance the company's visual identity and marketing strategies.
Help maintain and organize the company's design assets, ensuring accessibility for the entire team.
Stay up-to-date with design trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies to continuously improve design quality.

Requirements:

Pursuing a degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, Marketing, or a related field.
Proficient in Figma, Canva and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.).
Strong understanding of design principles, layout, typography, and color theory.
Ability to work creatively within established brand guidelines.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively within a team.
Detail-oriented and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Self-motivated, eager to learn, and open to feedback.
Basic understanding of marketing concepts and a desire to contribute to marketing strategies through design

Expected Weekly Commitment: Minimum 20 hours/week
Employment Type:  Internship
Paid: $15 - $17/hour
Location: Greater Phoenix Area / Scottsdale - Hybrid Role!
